page.title: 09HOUSING
page.content: Scattered farmhouses,some large.Generally well kept.Private bungalows and houses,some owner occupied and some rented. There are two council houses at Gillan and eight at Manaccan plus two old peoples' flats at Manaccan. All properties have modern conveniences, ie electricity and water.Several have central heating, either solid fuel,oil or gas. The largest private house is Bosahan Mansion with its beautiful gardens. Some old farm buildings have been converted to holiday lets,especially at St.Anthony,Helford Village and across the river at the "Ferryboat Inn at Helford Passage.
